project_descr: Institutional Support to Judiciary of Southern Sudan

outputs.output_descr: Project team established in the Judiciary to complete the implementation of the Project Implementation Phase (PIP) of the Institutional Support to the Judiciary of Southern Sudan.

The JoSS lacks appropriate organizational structure and human capital development policy coupled with inadequate training & research capacity. The JoSS has limited number of judicial staff proficient in common law, English language & ICT. Further,    Support staff has limited capacity to execute the mandate of JoSS. To enhance JoSS staff capacity, the project supports the implementation of integrated capacity development activities in collaboration with JoSS.
donor_name: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA

project_title: support to judiciary of southern sudan
